Ranked Mafia Returns Dracula's Palace Town Traitor Town Traitor Normal games are games with a pre-set role list. These games include a game mode usually for beginners, Ranked Practice which 10 games are needed to unlocked ranked, and Ranked which requires you to have played 50 games with 10 of those being Ranked Practice games. Custom games allows the host to pick and choose their own role list. Chaos games include pre-set role lists that are meant to be fun! Classic mode has a smaller variety of roles and less random roles. Custom mode has access to all roles. All Any mode has a role list of Any roles. Rapid mode has much faster discussion and night phases. Vigilante vs Witch chaos. For experienced, competitive players. You must have at least 50 games played, with 10 of those being ranked practice games, before you can play Ranked. A practice mode for ranked competitive play. You must have at least 50 games played, with 10 of those being in this ranked practice mode, before you can play Ranked. For experienced, competitive players. You must have at least 50 games played, with 10 of those being Coven games and 10 of those being ranked practice games, before you can play Ranked. A practice mode for ranked competitive play with its own unique role list. The mafia is back and stronger than ever, with two new members! Vampires have taken over the Town. Trust no one. A little bit of everything. How to play Town of Salem. Choose from any of the Classic or Coven roles.
Classic mode has a smaller variety of roles and less random roles. This mode is a Town vs Coven mode that will have a Town member randomly selected to be the VIP. If the VIP dies the town loses.
All Any mode has a role list of Any roles. Devs are the best! This mode is a Town vs Killers mode that will randomly pair people as Lovers. Keep your lover alive, regardless of their faction! This mode is a Town vs Killers mode that will randomly pair people as Rivals. Kill your rival at any cost, regardless of their faction! A Town member has gone over to the side of the Coven! A Town member has gone over to the side of the Mafia!
This mode is a Town vs Killers mode that will randomly pair people as Lovers. Keep your lover alive, regardless of their faction!
This mode is a Town vs Killers mode that will randomly pair people as Rivals. Kill your rival at any cost, regardless of their faction!
This mode is a Town vs Coven mode that will have a Town member randomly selected to be the VIP. If the VIP dies the town loses. This is a rotating game mode. Rotating game modes swap out every Tuesday at 10 AM CST. <align="center"><b><color=#FFD200><size="38"><smallcaps>The Rules</smallcaps></size></color></b></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><b><color=#FFD200>No Hate Speech or Harassment</color></b></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%>Using offensive language is not allowed. This includes but is not limited to: racism, country shaming, language shaming, religious intolerance, intolerance to sexual orientations, sexism, and general bigotry, pedophilia, crimes against children, and mocking tragedies/shootings/terrorist events.</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%>Harassing, threatening, attacking, or shaming users is not allowed. This includes but is not limited to: money/skin shaming, posting personal info, and inciting false reports.</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%>Do not send explicit sexual content, use obscene language, or attempt to evade the filter.</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><b><color=#FFD200>No Posting Links</color></b></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%>Posting links (URLs) to any site is prohibited.</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><b><color=#FFD200>No Gamethrowing</color></b></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%>Intentionally losing the game or hurting your teams chances of winning (even if that team is just you) is gamethrowing. Intentionally going against your role's goal is also gamethrowing.</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%><b><color=#FFB84D>Example 1: </color></b>A Mafia member dies and in his last will he reveals the names of all the living Mafia members. If those names are true then you are gamethrowing, if they are false then you are not.</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%><b><color=#FFB84D>Example 2: </color></b>A Vigilante or Jailor killing a revealed Mayor is gamethrowing.</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><b><color=#FFD200>No Spamming</color></b></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%>We define spamming as: Disrupting the chat with similar messages multiple times, or many messages that are gibberish</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><b><color=#FFD200>No Cheating</color></b></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%>Do not attempt to gain an unfair advantage over players through means other than normal gameplay. This includes but is not limited to using multiple accounts in the same game, sharing information outside the game (i.e. Skype, Discord), using a foreign language to communicate in a way that cannot be understood by the players in the current locale, or using bots or hacks.</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><b><color=#FFD200>No Inappropriate Names</color></b></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%>Do not create or use a username or in-game name that would be considered inappropriate. Give Invite Power to Player Give Host to Player Kick Player Has Invite Powers Steam Linking Help <color=#FFC300><size=120%>How does Steam linking work?<size=100%></color>
Steam Linking allows you to link your Town of Salem (Tos) account to your Steam account. Once this is done, you can sign in using the Login with Steam button and not have to enter a username or password again.
It is possible to have multiple Steam accounts and to have multiple Town of Salem (ToS) accounts. However, you can only ever link ONE ToS account to a particular Steam account because the relationship between a ToS account and a Steam account is 1 to 1.
However, if you have an alternate Town of Salem account that is NOT restricted* or is a Premium† account, you can choose to sign in with the username and password for that ToS account even though your Steam account is not linked to the ToS account. This allows you to play additional premium or grandfathered ToS accounts via your Steam account.
What you CANNOT do is play a restricted* ToS account via Steam when your Steam account has already been linked to another ToS account. If you attempt to do this, you will be prompted repeatedly if you want to link your ToS account to Steam. If you choose to link, it will fail and you will be prompted again to link your account.
<color=#FFC300><size=80%>* Restricted - not Premium† and not grandfathered†† † Premium - a ToS account that has purchased Mobile Premium, Web Premium, or Steam †† Grandfathered - granted free access before Town of Salem moved to Pay-to-Play<size=100%></color> Upgrade your account You must upgrade your account to a premium account to access The Coven Expansion. Byly zolnierz, ktory potajemnie zarabia na zycie sprzedajac ochrone. Ta rola umozliwia strzezenie jednej osoby w nocy. Jesli ktos zaatakuje strzezonego gracza, atakujacy i ochroniarz zgina zamiast strzezonego gracza.
Chirurg specjalizujacy sie w leczeniu urazow, ktory potajemnie leczy ludzi. Ta rola umozliwia uratowanie kogos od smierci w nocy.
Piekna osoba zdolna do odwracania uwagi. Ta rola ma zdolnosc zajmowania czyjejs nocy, uniemozliwiajac jej uzycie zdolnosci nocnej.
Prywatny detektyw, ktory potajemnie zbiera informacje. Ta rola ma mozliwosc sprawdzania kogos w nocy, ujawniajac wiecej informacji o jego roli.
Straznik wiezienny, ktory potajemnie przetrzymuje podejrzanych. Ta rola umozliwia uwiezienie kogos w nocy, blokujac go. Straznik wiezienny moze potajemnie rozmawiac z zatrzymanym i opcjonalnie wykonac na nim egzekucje.
Obserwator o sokolich oczach, ukradkiem obozujacy przed domami w celu zdobycia informacji. Ta rola umozliwia obserwowanie kogos w nocy. Obserwator zidentyfikuje do trzech osob, ktore odwiedzaja swoj cel tej nocy.
Przywodca miasta. Ta rola umozliwia ujawnienie sie miastu. Po ujawnieniu burmistrza ich glos liczy sie jako 3 glosy.
Tajny jasnowidz, ktory rozmawia ze zmarlymi. Ta rola daje mozliwosc rozmowy z jedna martwa osoba kazdej nocy.
Potezny mistyk, ktory moze wskrzesic zmarlych o prawdziwym sercu. Ta rola umozliwia kazdej nocy wskrzeszanie prawdziwych czlonkow Town.
Straznik prawa z miasta zmuszony do ukrywania sie przed grozba morderstwa. Ta rola ma mozliwosc sprawdzenia jednej osoby w nocy pod katem dzialalnosci przestepczej.
Utalentowany obserwator, ktory sledzi zlo w Miescie. Ta rola pozwala zobaczyc, kogo mafia i sabat odwiedzaja kazdej nocy.
Osoba, ktora przewozi ludzi bez zadawania pytan. Ta rola umozliwia transport dwoch osob, zamieniajac wszystkie dzialania podjete przeciwko nim w nocy.
Kaplan, ktory stal sie lowca potworow, zabija wampiry. Ta rola umozliwia sprawdzanie wampirow kazdej nocy. Nie mozna ich przemienic w wampira, jesli zostana ugryzione, zamiast tego zabija wampira.
Paranoiczny bohater wojenny, ktory strzela do kazdego, kto go odwiedzi. Ta rola umozliwia zachowanie czujnosci w nocy i strzelanie do kazdego, kto ja odwiedza.
Bojowy glina, ktory bierze prawo w swoje rece. Ta rola umozliwia zastrzelenie kogos w nocy.
Podsluchujacy, ktory uzywa informacji, aby uciszyc ludzi. Ta rola umozliwia powstrzymanie kogos od mowienia nastepnego dnia.
Skorumpowany sledczy, ktory zbiera informacje dla mafii. Ta rola umozliwia identyfikowanie roli jednej osoby kazdej nocy.
Piekna tancerka pracujaca dla przestepczosci zorganizowanej. Ta rola ma zdolnosc odwracania uwagi jednej osoby w nocy, uniemozliwiajac jej wykonanie nocnej zdolnosci.
Mistrz makijazu, ktory potrafi przebierac innych ludzi. Ta rola umozliwia przebranie kogos za innego gracza.
Nieuczciwy prawnik, ktory podmienia dokumenty. Ta rola ma mozliwosc falszowania rol i dziennikow, zmieniajac to, co jest wyswietlane po smierci celu.
Umiejetny falszerz, ktory manipuluje informacjami. Ta rola umozliwia wrobienie kogos w nocy, zmieniajac informacje, jakie role sledcze otrzymaja tej nocy.
Lider przestepczosci zorganizowanej. Ta rola ma mozliwosc zaatakowania kogos w nocy. Ojciec chrzestny bedzie wygladal na niewinnego w rolach sledczych.
Ekspert sanitarny pracujacy dla przestepczosci zorganizowanej. Ta rola umozliwia oczyszczenie zwlok, zapobiegajac ujawnieniu roli i ostatniej woli.
Czlonek przestepczosci zorganizowanej, probujacy dostac sie na szczyt. Ta rola wykona brudna robote Ojca Chrzestnego, zapobiegajac ujawnieniu sie Ojca Chrzestnego. Jesli Ojciec Chrzestny umrze, Mafioso zostanie Ojcem Chrzestnym.
Pacjent urazowy, ktory nie pamieta, kim byl. Ta rola moze stac sie inna rola z cmentarza.
Piroman, ktory chce spalic wszystkich. Ta rola umozliwia oblewanie kogos gazem lub podpalanie wszystkich wczesniej oblanych celow.
Obsesyjny lyncher, ktory nie cofnie sie przed niczym, by zabic swoj cel. Ta rola wygrywa, jesli ich cel zostanie zlinczowany, gdy kat wciaz zyje.
Szalony szaleniec, ktorego zyciowym celem jest publiczna egzekucja. Ta rola wygrywa, jesli zostanie zlinczowany. Nastepnej nocy jeden z winnych lub wstrzymujacych sie wyborcow popelni samobojstwo.
Psychiczny przestepca, ktory chce smierci wszystkich. Ta rola ma mozliwosc zaatakowania kogos kazdej nocy. Jesli osoba blokujaca role odwiedzi seryjnego morderce, osoba blokujaca role umrze, chyba ze aktywna jest umiejetnosc Ostroznosc.
Neutralnyna postac, ktora po prostu chce zyc. Ta rola wygra z kazdym, o ile dozyje konca.
Spragniony krwi wampir, ktory noca gryzie i zamienia ludzi w wampiry. Ta rola zmienia noca mieszkancow miasta i niektore Neutralnyne postacie w wampiry. Wampiry jako frakcja glosuja, kogo ugryzc i potrafia komunikowac sie w nocy.
Samotny obywatel, ktory zmienia sie podczas pelni ksiezyca. Ta rola ma zdolnosc przeksztalcania sie podczas pelni ksiezyca i mordowania masowych ilosci ludzi.
Mistrz voodoo, ktory moze kontrolowac dzialania innych ludzi. Ta rola umozliwia kontrolowanie kogos innego i zmuszanie go do uzycia nocnej zdolnosci na celu wiedzmy. Moze to byc dowolna rola miasta. Moze byc sledczym, obserwatorem, szeryfem lub szpiegiem. Moze byc ochroniarzem lub lekarzem. Moze byc straznikiem wieziennym, weteranem, straznikiem lub lowca wampirow. Moze byc eskorta, burmistrzem, medium, retrybucjonista lub transporterem. Moze to byc dowolna rola mafijna. Moze byc consigliere, malzonkiem lub szantazysta. Moze byc przebierancem, falszerzem, tworca ram lub woznym. Moze to byc dowolna Neutralnyna rola. Moze cierpiec na amnezje lub przezyc. Moze byc katem, blaznem lub czarownica. Moze byc podpalaczem, seryjnym morderca lub wilkolakiem. Moze to byc dowolna rola w grze.
Boski obronca biegly w sztuce walki. Ta rola ma mozliwosc ochrony gracza w nocy i zaatakuje losowo jednego goscia tej samej nocy.
Doswiadczony tropiciel, ktory podazy za swoja ofiara do dowolnego miejsca. Ta rola umozliwia sledzenie gracza w celu ustalenia, kogo odwiedza w nocy.
Inteligentny drwal ze smykalka do pulapek. Ta rola ma mozliwosc umieszczania pulapek, ktore beda uruchamiane podczas odwiedzin.
Potezny widzacy z darem znajdowania wlasnych sekretow. W nieparzyste noce ta rola ma wizje trzech graczy, z ktorych przynajmniej jeden jest Zlem. W parzyste noce wizja przedstawia dwoch graczy, z ktorych przynajmniej jeden jest dobry.
Umiejetny hipnotyzer, ktory moze zmienic postrzeganie innych. Ta rola umozliwia przekazanie komus falszywej informacji zwrotnej w nocy.
Ukradkowy zabojca, ktory czyha na idealny moment do ataku. Ta rola ma mozliwosc zaatakowania jednego odwiedzajacego ich cel.
Smiertelna postac Zarazy, musisz zarazic miasto zaraza, aby odzyskac swoje moce. Ta rola umozliwia zarazanie kogos kazdej nocy. Zainfekowani gracze beda rozprzestrzeniac chorobe poprzez wizyty i bycie odwiedzanym.
Niepowstrzymana sila, ktora staje sie silniejsza z kazdym zabiciem. Ta rola zyskuje dodatkowe umiejetnosci przy kazdym zabiciu.
Aniol, ktorego jedynym celem jest ochrona twojego podopiecznego. Ta rola ma przypisany cel, ktory musi starac sie utrzymac przy zyciu do konca gry.
Awanturnik z obsesja na punkcie zlota. Ta rola daje mozliwosc zaatakowania gracza kazdej nocy. Masz trzy metody ataku, a twoje cele maja trzy metody obrony, aby powstrzymac atak. Wybierz madrze!
Mistrz voodoo, ktory moze kontrolowac dzialania innych. Ta rola umozliwia kontrolowanie kogos innego i zmuszanie go do uzycia nocnej zdolnosci na celu przywodcow sabatu.
Doswiadczony alchemik z poteznymi recepturami na mikstury. Ta rola ma zdolnosc leczenia, badania lub atakowania gracza swoimi trzema miksturami.
Procerz zaklec z biegloscia w rzucaniu heksow. Ta rola umozliwia przeklecie gracza. Kiedy wszyscy zyjacy gracze zostana rzuceni klatwa, wszyscy zostana zaatakowani.
Zla czarodziejka, ktora zywi uraze do miasta. Ta rola umozliwia kontrolowanie martwych graczy w celu uzycia ich umiejetnosci na zywych.
Cierpliwy zabojca ze znajomoscia trujacych roslin. Ta rola ma mozliwosc zatrucia gracza, co zaszkodzi mu po jednodniowym opoznieniu.
Wezowy potwor o kamiennym spojrzeniu. Ta rola ma mozliwosc blokowania spojrzen graczy zamieniajacych je w kamien i ukrywania roli tego gracza. Moze byc dowolna rola sabatu. Moze to byc dowolna rola miasta. Moze byc sledczym, obserwatorem, szeryfem, szpiegiem, tropicielem lub medium. Moze byc ochroniarzem, lekarzem, krzyzowcem lub traperem. Moze byc straznikiem wieziennym, lowca wampirow, weteranem lub straznikiem. Moze byc eskorta, burmistrzem, medium, retrybucjonista lub transporterem. Moze to byc dowolna rola mafijna. Moze byc consigliere, malzonkiem lub szantazysta. Moze byc przebranym, falszerzem, tworca ram, woznym lub hipnotyzerem. Moze to byc dowolna Neutralnyna rola. Moze byc chory na amnezje, ocalaly lub aniol stroz. Moze byc katem lub blaznem. Moze byc podpalaczem, seryjnym morderca lub wilkolakiem. Moze to byc dowolna rola w grze. Moze byc nosicielem zarazy, piratem lub wampirem.
Jezdziec apokalipsy, ktory zywi sie chorobami. Ta rola zaatakuje kazdego, kto odwiedzi jego cel i kazdego, kto go odwiedzi.

Mafia -Kazdego wieczoru sprawdzaj jedna osobe pod katem jej dokladnej roli. -Jesli nie ma juz rol mafijnych zdolnych do zabijania, staniesz sie <color=#DD0000>mafioso</color>. -Mozesz rozmawiac z innymi mafiosami w nocy.
Zabij kazdego, kto nie podda sie mafii.
Mafia
-Odwroc uwage kogos kazdej nocy. -Rozproszenie blokuje twojemu celowi uzycie nocnej zdolnosci jego roli. -Jesli nie ma juz rol mafijnych zdolnych do zabijania, staniesz sie <color=#DD0000>mafiosem</color>. -Mozesz rozmawiac z innymi mafiosami w nocy. Zabij kazdego, kto nie podda sie mafii. Mafia -Przebierz czlonka mafii za czlonka miasta, aby zmienic jego tozsamosc. -Przebrany czlonek mafii bedzie odgrywal taka sama role jak obywatel miasta dla <color=#7FFF00>sledczego</ color> i <color=#7FFF00>szeryf</color>. -Twoj przebrany czlonek mafii bedzie wygladal jak druga osoba dla <color=#7FFF00>Lookout</color>. -Gdy jest przebrany za czlonka miasta, <color=#7FFF00>szpieg</color> nie dziala na tego osobnika Zabij kazdego, kto nie podda sie mafii.
Mafia -Wybierz osobe i sfabrykuj jego dziennik w nocy. -Jesli twoj cel umrze, jego dziennik zostanie zastapiony twoim falszerstwem, a jego rola zostanie pokazana jako rola wybrana do sfalszowania.Mozesz wykonac tylko 2 falszerstwa.
Zabij kazdego, kto nie podda sie mafii.
Mafia -Wybierz kogos zeby zfalszowac informacje na jego temat. -Jesli twoj cel zostanie zbadany, bedzie wygladal podejrzanie. -Jesli nie ma juz rol mafijnych zdolnych do zabijania, staniesz sie <color=#DD0000>mafiosem</color>.
Zabij kazdego, kto nie podda sie mafii.
Mafia -Mozzesz zaatakowac gracza kazdej nocy. Miasto -Jesli w poblizu znajduje sie <color=#DD0000>Mafioso</color>, zaatakuje on cel zamiast ciebie. -Bedziesz wygladal na niewinnego dla <color=#7FFF00>Sheriffa</color>. -Mozesz rozmawiac z innymi mafiosami w nocy.
Zabij kazdego, kto nie podda sie mafii..
Mafia -Wybierz osobe do usuniecia w nocy. -Jesli twoj cel umrze, jego rola i dzienniczek nie zostana ujawnione miastu. -Tylko ty zobaczysz role usunietych celow i dzienniczkow. -Mozesz wykonac tylko 3 usuniecia.
Zabij kazdego, kto nie podda sie mafii..
Mafia -Wykonaj rozkazy <color=#DD0000>Ojca chrzestnego</color>. -Mozesz zaatakowac, jesli <color=#DD0000>Ojciec chrzestny</color> nie wyda ci rozkazow. -Jesli <color=#DD0000>Ojciec chrzestny</color> umrze, zostaniesz nastepnym <color=#DD0000> Ojcem chrzestnym</color>. -Mozesz rozmawiac z innymi mafiosami w nocy.
Zabij kazdego, kto nie podda sie mafii..
Mafia -Przypomnij, kim byles, wybierajac role cmentarza. -Kiedy wybierzesz role, zostanie ona ujawniona wszystkim graczom w grze. Przypomnij sobie, kim byles i wypelnij cel tej roli.
Neutralnyny -Mozesz %GUI_ROLE_CARD_DOUSE% kogos w benzynie lub podpalic %GUI_ROLE_CARD_DOUSE%d celow. -Wybierz siebie, aby podpalic oblanych ludzi, zadajac atak %GUI_ROLE_CARD_UNSTOPPABLE_ATTACK%. - Oblejesz kazdego, kto cie odwiedzi. -Jesli nie podejmiesz zadnych dzialan, sprobujesz zmyc z siebie benzyne. Zyj, aby zobaczyc, jak wszyscy plona.
Neutralny -Oszukaj miasto, aby zlinczowalo twoj cel. -Twoj cel to %name%. -Jesli twoj cel zostanie zabity w nocy, staniesz sie <color=#F5A6D4>Blaznem</color>. Doprowadz swoj cel do zlinczowania za wszelka cene.
Neutralny -Oszukaj miasto, aby glosowalo przeciwko tobie. -Jesli zostaniesz zlinczowany, nastepnej nocy zaatakujesz jednego z winnych lub wstrzymujacych sie wyborcow atakiem %GUI_ROLE_CARD_UNSTOPPABLE_ATTACK%. Daj sie zlinczowac za wszelka cene.
Neutralny -Mozesz zaatakowac gracza kazdej nocy. -Jesli twoja rola jest zablokowana, oprocz twojego celu zaatakujesz rowniez blokujaca role. -Osoby blokujace role, ktore cie atakuja, beda mialy dziennik pokryta krwia, przez co bedzie ona nieczytelna. -Mozesz zachowac ostroznosc i nie zabijac blokujacych role. Zabij wszystkich, ktorzy beda ci sie sprzeciwiac.
Neutralny -Zaloz kamizelke kuloodporna na noc. -Zalozenie kamizelki kuloodpornej zapewnia %GUI_ROLE_CARD_BASIC_DEFENSE% obrony. -Mozesz uzyc kamizelki kuloodpornej tylko 4 razy. Przezyj do konca gry.
Neutralny -%GUI_ROLE_CARD_CONVERT% innych na <color=#7B8968>Wampiry</color> w nocy do maksymalnie 4 <color=#7B8968>Wampiry</color>! -<color=#7B8968>Wampiry</color> glosuja w nocy, aby ugryzc cel. - Najmlodszy <color=#7B8968>Wampir</color> odwiedzi cel noca. Nawroc wszystkich, ktorzy beda ci sie sprzeciwiac.
Neutralny -Przemien sie w <color=#9D7038>wilkolaka</color> podczas pelni ksiezyca. -Zostaniesz %GUI_ROLE_CARD_RAMPAGE% w domu gracza podczas ataku. -Jesli nie wybierzesz celu, zostaniesz w domu i %GUI_ROLE_CARD_RAMPAGE% w swoim domu.
Zabij wszystkich, ktorzy beda ci sie sprzeciwiac.
Neutralny -%GUI_ROLE_CARD_CONTROL% ktos kazdej nocy. -Masz mistyczna bariere, ktora zapewnia %GUI_ROLE_CARD_BASIC_DEFENSE% obrony, dopoki nie zostaniesz zaatakowany. - Poznasz role gracza %GUI_ROLE_CARD_CONTROL%. Przetrwaj i zobacz, jak miasto przegrywa.

Przesluchujesz swoj cel, aby dowiedziec sie, czy wydaje sie podejrzany. Wszyscy czlonkowie mafii, z wyjatkiem Ojca Chrzestnego, beda podejrzliwi. Wszyscy czlonkowie sabatu, z wyjatkiem posiadacza Necronomiconu, beda wydawali sie podejrzliwi. Seryjny morderca bedzie wygladal podejrzanie. Wilkolak bedzie wydawal sie podejrzliwy w noce przy pelni ksiezyca i niewinny w noce bez pelni ksiezyca. Cele w ramkach i przeklete beda wygladac podejrzanie.

Szalenstwo

Pulapki zostana uruchomione na graczach bezposrednio odwiedzajacych uwiezionego gracza, ale zaszkodza tylko atakujacym. W momencie uruchomienia pulapki gracz otrzymuje informacje o rolach graczy, ktorzy odwiedzaja uwieziony cel. Pulapka . Oblani gracze beda mieli zmienione wyniki sledztwa na <color=#7FFF00>Bodyguard</color>, <color=#9D7038>Godfather</color>, lub <color=#EB7601>Arsonist</color>. Gracze nie beda wiedziec, ze zostali oblani gazem. Douse . Napietnowani gracze nie beda wiedziec, ze zostali napietnowani. Gdy wszyscy zywi gracze zostana naznaczeni, ofiary otrzymaja atak nie do powstrzymania. Wyniki sledztwa graczy poddanych hexowi zostana zmienione. Hex . Twoje wizyty nie uruchomia zadnej mechaniki, ktora polega na odwiedzeniu gracza. Obejmuje to <color=#7FFF00>Lookouts</color>, <color=#7FFF00>Trackers</color>, <color=#7FFF00>Veterans</color>, <color=#7FFF00>Bodyguards</color>, <color=#7FFF00>Trappers</color>, <color=#7FFF00>Crusaders</color>, <color=#DD0000>Ambushers</color>, <color=#CFFF63>Plaguebearer</color>, <color=#424242>Pestilence</color>, <color=#9D7038>Werewolf</color> i <color=#CF36FE>Medusa</color>.. Astral . Przekonwertowani gracze stana sie <color=#7B8968>wampirami</color> i dolacza do twojej druzyny, maksymalnie do 4 <color=#7B8968>wampirow</color>. Pomiedzy konwersjami nalezy odczekac jedna noc. Jesli cel nie moze zostac przemieniony, zostanie zaatakowany atakiem podstawowym. <align="center"><b><color=#FFD200><size="38"><smallcaps>Welcome to the Cauldron!</smallcaps></size></color></b></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%>The Cauldron Daily Brew is an activity-based reward system that lets you receive shop items for free based on how often you log into the game. The Daily Brew awards daily merit points, with a larger prize awarded on the last day of the seven day brewing period. We've answered a number of questions that you may have about the Cauldron below.</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><b><color=#FFD200>How Does The Cauldron Daily Brew Work?</color></b></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%>Every day that you log on to Town of Salem, you can visit the Cauldron by clicking the Daily Brew button in the Home navigation menu. When the Cauldron screen opens, a Witch awaits you behind her cauldron. The Witch gives you a free daily potion that you apply to the Cauldron brew, awarding you 20 Merit Points (or 40 MP for Steam linked or Web Premium accounts). Return each day to apply your free daily potion, and on the seventh day you will win a free random Prize which can include any item from the Shop minus certain exclusive items (such as Refer-a-Friend, SteamBot3000, Kickstarter award items, and Boat Load of Swag).</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><b><color=#FFD200>What Kind of Prizes Can The Cauldron Award?</color></b></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%>The Cauldron can award character skins, pets, houses, maps, lobby icons, scrolls, taunts, themes, death animations, and merit points. They are all potential prizes that can be awarded.</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><b><color=#FFD200>Can the Cauldron Award Town Point-Only Items?</color></b></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%>Yes, the Cauldon can award Town Point-only items!</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><b><color=#FFD200>Do I Have To Visit the Cauldron Every Day to Retain My Progress?</color></b></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%>You do not have to visit every day. You will NOT lose your progress if you miss a day or multiple days. However, the days you do not apply your free daily potion will not count towards completing your seven day brew. Only the days that you visit the Cauldron and apply your potion count towards the completion of the seven day brew.</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><b><color=#FFD200>How Often Can I Visit The Cauldron?</color></b></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%>The Cauldron has a 23 hour cooldown between free daily potions. The Daily Brew button at the top of the screen shows how much time remains before the next daily potion can be claimed.</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><b><color=#FFD200>Can I Specialize My Brew to Guarantee I Receive a Certain Type of Prize?</color></b></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%>Yes. If you choose to, you can specialize your brew by purchasing a potion using Town Points. The special potion enhances your Cauldron to ensure you receive a certain kind of prize on the seventh day. These specialization potions are optional. The specialization potions available are listed below.</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%><b><color=#FFB84D>Character potion</color></b> - guarantees your prize will be a Character skin.</indent></align> <align="left"><indent=5%><b><color=#FFB84D>Pet Potion</color></b> - guarantees your prize will be a Pet skin.</indent></align> <align="left"><indent=5%><b><color=#FFB84D>Death Animation Potion</color></b> - guarantees your prize will be a Death Animation.</indent></align> <align="left"><indent=5%><b><color=#FFB84D>House Potion</color></b> - guarantees your prize will be a House.</indent></align> <align="left"><indent=5%><b><color=#FFB84D>Legendary Potion</color></b> - guarantees you a high value item from the shop (above 2,000TP) such as Uriel, Beelzebub, or Map Pack bundles! If you're awarded a bundle, the Cauldron will spew out multiple prizes!</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><b><color=#FFD200>Does the Default Brew Contain Every Prize Available With the Specialization Potions?</color></b></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%>Yes, every item that is available via the specialization potions can also be received via the default brew, just with a lesser chance since the pool of available prizes is larger.</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><b><color=#FFD200>Will The Cauldron Award Me a Prize That I Already Own?</color></b></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%>The Cauldron will not award items that you already own except for consumables such as scrolls and taunts.</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><b><color=#FFD200>What If I Already Own All The Items in a Category?</color></b></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> <align="left"><indent=5%>If you already own all items in a category (ex: death animations) then the Cauldron will not let you purchase the specialization potion for that item. If you buy a specialization potion, then subsequently purchase all the items in that category from the shop while the Cauldron is still brewing, then the Cauldron will award you an alternate prize.</indent></align> <align="left"><nobr> </nobr></align> Bodyguard Doctor Escort Investigator Jailor Lookout Mayor Medium Retributionist Sheriff Spy Transporter Vampire Hunter Veteran Vigilante <line-indent=5%><align="left">A harsh winter befell the town, covering it in a thin coating of powdery snow. A frigid, chilling wind whipped through, carrying with it an eerie green smoke containing a deep sickness. Town members were held up in their homes, lethargic, and on the brink of death. The Witch stood over the town frustrated. “This isn’t how this is supposed to go. This town has taken so much from me, I am supposed to be the one to end it!“ shouted the Witch from the mouth of the Coven’s cave. Helena approached the Witch. “You will get your revenge. We will make sure of that.” “Thank you Helena,” said the Witch, turning to address the Coven. “Now, do any of you know who is this being spreading this disease, or what kind of sorcery is being wrought?” Bakt the Necromancer, Nikki the Potion Master, Helena the Hexmaster, Medusa the Gorgon, and Kande the Poisoner looked around uneasily. No one knew who or what the being was, but it was obviously powerful considering how easily it had plunged the whole town into disease. “If we are going to battle this being, we need more power on our side,” said the Witch. A speck of snow landed on the tip of the Witch’s nose, sparking an idea. The Witch rushed into the cave and began rummaging around. Nikki asked, “What are you looking for?” “Perfect!” said the Witch, pulling out what appeared to be a petrified branch encased in ice. “This is exactly what we need.” “What is it?” asked Medusa. “It is an ancient relic as old as Earth, and it will give us all the extra help that we need. One of my past Coven members gave it to me as an incentive to join the Coven. I knew it would be useful one day,” grinned the Witch. “Gather round and channel your energies into the ice with me. We need to melt it and a normal fire will not do.” Nikki and Kande worked together to prepare a magic-enhancing potion for the others to drink, while the Witch, Helena, Bakt, and Medusa channeled magic into the ice. The Witch's power forced its way into the stone, while Helena’s magic covered the outside of the ice. Bakt’s magic seeped up from the ground and grabbed hold of the ice. Medusa’s magic flowed in a blinding light from the snakes encircling her head. The ice started to shimmer as the Witch cackled. “Keep focusing your magic into the ice!” As the ice melted, the wind picked up and clouds formed overhead. The snow started to fall faster and heavier, swirling around the witches feet before being carried off by the wind. Before long the witches were at the center of a snowy tornado. From the corner of her eye, the Witch saw a shadowy figure walking towards them. The figure parted the snow easily and reached for the branch. “Give me that, you cretins. You have no idea what you are doing with it!” The figure snatched the branch, and as he did so, his shadowy shaper resolved before the witches as an old man with pale blue skin and snow white hair, clad in a robe. “Do you know what you have done! You have disrupted the natural order!” exclaimed the old man. “We know what this means, but we need your help, Jack,” said the Witch calmly. Helena gasped. “Jack? Jack Frost?” “The Spirit of Winter,” the old man confirmed. “Now, you willingly upset the balance of the seasons? By releasing my relic you have swayed the seasons in favor of Winter and upset the other spirits,” scolded Jack. “Whatever that means, we will deal with it later. We need your help to defeat someone. A being whose powers are unknown to us, and quite powerful,” says the Witch. “Later? I don’t think you understand the gravity of the situation. In ancient times the seasonal spirits almost tore the world apart fighting over which one of us would be left to rule. When the world--and each of us---were on the brink of death we all agreed to seal away our relics of power and rule together. Now we each take our time to see our perfect vision of the world,” explained Jack. “We can reseal the relic, but first we need your help. As I said, there is someone we need your help to defeat. Someone more powerful than anyone I have ever seen before. This being carries a lantern that spewed green smoke down onto Salem, causing sickness and disease to spread. I can not allow these people to die by his hands. Those towns members took everything from me, and I will be the one to take everything from them,” the Witch said savagely. “What? A lantern with green smoke? This can’t be what I think it is,” Jack said worriedly. The witch's eyes widened. “You know who this is? Tell us so that we can defeat it.” “If I am not mistaken, this is the work of the Plaguebearer. He is a fell man whose only goal is to spread disease among as many people as possible. This Plaguebearer has lived for as long as I can remember, and is rumored to be something even more terrifying,” trembled Jack. “We need to deal with this, and fast. I will help you, and once this is over, you will return my relic to the ice.” “If you are this worried, then we should go now,” pressured the Witch. Jack looked around at the other Coven members, assessing whether their combined might would be enough. With no time to waste, he agreed to join the witches as they set out towards the source of the green smoke. The group trudged through Salem, looking this way and that. People were stumbling around, lethargic and coughing. Caught up in their own misery, none of the townspeople reacted to them at all. Throughout Salem every soul was infected. In the distance beyond the town, they could see smoke pouring out of the forest. As the Coven and Jack Frost approachd the edge of the forest, the smoke became heavier, thicker, and more toxic. Bakt began to cough violently, and everyone turned towards her. Bakt's skin was paler than normal, and she appeared a bit sluggish. “Nikki, Kande, what is wrong with her?” asked the Witch. “The smoke, it is affecting her. We will take care of this.” Nikki and Kande worked together to create a concoction to help Bakt, and then they continued on their way. They entered the forest and each member began to feel the effects of the smoke. Nikki distributed the rest of the concoction to the party to help protect them from the effects of the smoke. From deep in the forest they could hear a horse neighing. The group pushed forward toward the sound of the horse, passing through the trees, and shortly found themselves at a hut. Tied up outside the hut was a pale, sickly horse standing next to a festering trough infested with all manner of insects and algae. From the hut billowed green smoke, and the trees in the area decayed before the group’s eyes. “Are we ready?” whispered the Witch. The party glanced around and each other and all nodded. Drawing himself to his full height, Jack summoned forth a winter blast of wind that blew the door to the hut off its hinges. Inside, next to the chimney, sat the Plaguebearer, stoking the fire. The Plaguebearer glanced up at the group briefly, and barely paying them any attention turned back to the fire. The Witch was puzzled and infuriated by the Plaguebearer’s nonchalant attitude after having his door blown off its hinges. “Who do you think you are?” shouted the Witch. “Salem is my town to destroy, and I will not let you snatch it out from under me, do you hear me?” The Plaguebearer continued to stoke the fire, ignoring the angry witch and her group. “Look at me, you toad!” screeched the Witch, hurling a spell at the Plaguebearer. The spell smashed into the Plaguebearer, but barely caused his jacket to ruffle. The Plaguebearer stood slowly and turned to the Witch. He stared at her, not saying anything. His gaze pierced through the Witch’s soul like a dagger through the heart. The Witch stepped back a pace, uneasy and wary of the Plaguebearer. She looked back at the rest of the group and said, “Don’t just stand there! Get him!” Jack waved his relic towards the door. The ice and snow piled up around the entrance swirled together into a humanoid shape. He waved the ice elemental towards the Plaguebearer while Bakt summoned hands that began to form and reach up from the floors. The elemental reared back to punch the Plaguebearer, but just before the punch landed, the Plaguebearer reached into the elemental's chest and it crumbled to pieces. The hands reaching up from the ground latched onto the legs of the Plaguebearer, holding him in place. Nikki reached into her coat and pulled out a vial that she threw at the Plaguebearer. It shattered upon his shoulder, releasing a liquid that steamed and bubbled. The Plaguebearer didn't make a sound, but he grabbed his shoulder in pain. “What is he?” shouted Medusa. “Just keep attacking!” screamed the Witch as she hurled a ball of light towards the Plaguebearer. The Plaguebearer was bleeding now, but he didn't appear noticeably concerned. He calmly wiped the blood off with his coat. He picked up his lantern and a flash of green light blinded the group. When their vision returned, they could see that the hands that had been holding the Plaguebearer had dissipated, and he was holding Medusa by the throat as her feet dangled above the ground. “Medusa!” shouted the Coven. The Plaguebearer’s eyes darted towards the remainder of the group, then back to Medusa. He tighened his grip on Medusa’s throat. She tried to scream, but the grip on her throat was so tight she could not even manage a squeak. Jack summoned another icy blast of wind that swept the Plaguebearer off of his feet, causing him to release Medusa. Medusa quickly slithered back to the group, rubbing her raw neck. As the Plaguebearer stood back up, the Witch noticed that the smoke from his lantern was not as thick as before, and its effects on her seemed to be lessening, although they were all very weak, even Jack, from the smoke and the effort of casting spells. An idea came to the Witch. It would be all or nothing. “Jack, hold him off for us. I have an idea, it might be just enough for us to win this!” said the Witch. “Everyone else, channel the remainder of your magic into me.” Jack summoned three more ice elementals to help stall the Plaguebearer. The Plaguebearer slowly stepped forward, challenging Jack. Jack motioned his elementals in and threw a spear of ice towards the Plaguebearer. The Plaguebearer tried to deflect the spear, but it seemed as though his movements were slower than normal, and the spear grazed his side. As the Plaguebearer looked down to check his wound, one of the elementals caught the side of his face with a punch. The blow staggered the Plaguebearer, but as another elemental reached for him, the Plaguebearer grabbed its face and slammed it into the wall, shattering it. While the Plaguebearer was distracted by the ice elementals, the Coven members continued to channel their powers into the Witch. The power emanated from her in bright sparks as she began casting a spell. “Just a little longer, Jack!” the Witch cried. The Plaguebearer dispatched another elemental with a swift attack to its chest, but stumbled back from the force of the attack. Jack saw the opening and hurled another spear, this time piercing the Plaguebearer's leg. The last elemental rushed forward and landed a kick that sent the Plaguebearer flying into the wall. Another green light flashed in the hut. As the light faded, this time it was Jack that was in trouble. The Plaguebearer had Jack pinned to the ground, and he was beaten and bloodied. Jack croaked painfully as he looked over at them, “Now is just as good a time as any, witches". The Plaguebearer looked their way and tried to jump back, but it was too late. The Witch unleashed a powerful blast of magic that blew her back into the wall behind her. When the dust settled there was a gaping hole in the wall where the Plaguebearer had stood. The Witch stepped up to the hole, peering around for the Plaguebearer. There was a puddle of bloodstained snow where the Plaguebearer had landed after the blast. In the distance, she could see him fleeing atop his horse. The smoke began to clear from the forest as he rode off. The Witch could feel her strength beginning to return. “I think it is over. I think we won,” sighed the Witch with relief. When the group returned to their cave, the Witch turned to Jack and thanked him for his help. “We couldn’t have done this without you. I know you didn’t want to get involved.” “The Plaguebearer seems to be injured, and I doubt he will be coming back anytime soon. Just know that I won’t be coming back to help you again. Prepare for his return, and prepare for the worst when he does,” warned Jack Frost. The Coven placed their hands on Jack’s staff and began to channel their magic. Jack, using his own magic, blew on the staff with his icy breath, encasing it in ice once again. Then, with a slight smile, he turned to snow and drifted away on the wind. </align></line-indent> <align=center><b><size=110%>• • •</size></b></align>
<b>10/10/2022</b> Hey Townies, today we starting Ranked Season 6. We are also releasing a small patch to fix some issues with the QoL coloring and missing spaces in some of the feedback messages in chat, as well as the missing Season 5 Master lobby icon. This patch does not change the version number.
Happy Hanging!
<align=center><b><size=110%>• • •</size></b></align>
<b>10/05/2022</b> Hey Townies,
Today we are releasing Town of Salem patch 3.3.8 for a new Ranked Season. We've consulted with a number of people from the ToS community to introduce a new Classic Ranked role list for Ranked Season 6. You can play this new role list now. Offseason (ranked games not being counted toward your rank) will last a few days and then the season will start.
We're also releasing some new character skins; say hello to the Disguiser, Psychic, and Consigliere! With the release of these skins, we are converting some of the older skins which could only be purchased with Town Points to now be purchasable with Merit Points as well.
Additionally, the community (shoutout to ShadowDior, Curtis, and Tuba Antics) has been working with our team to implement some wording and coloring improvements to a number of the feedback messages in chat, as well as a new feature to highlight lines in the chat which contain your player number.
The full list of changes can be found below. Happy Hanging!
<b><u>New Features</u></b> • <indent=3%><b>Shop:</b> New Disguiser, Psychic and Consigiliere character skins are available for purchase in the Shop or to be awarded by the Cauldron.</indent>
<b><u>Improvements</u></b> • <indent=3%><b>Chat:</b> Coloring enhancements to some of the feedback messages.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Chat:</b> Wording improvements to some of the feedback messages.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Chat:</b> Highlighting of messages which contain your player number.</indent>
<b><u>Changes</u></b> • <indent=3%><b>Classic Ranked Role List:</b>The new Classic Ranked Role List contains the following: Jailor, 2 Town Investigative, Town Protective, 5 Random Town, Godfather, Mafioso, Mafia Support, Neutralny Killing, and Neutralny Evil.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Settings:</b> Extended Player Numbers will now be ON by default for new players. Extended Player Numbers can be turned on or off in the Settings dialog.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>iOS Suported Architectures:</b> The armv7 architecture is no longer supported on iOS.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Shop:</b> The following cosmetics are now purchasable with Merit Points:</indent> <indent=3%>- Pets: Owl, Carrion, Ina Field, Super Doge, Spike.</indent> <indent=3%>- Maps: Army, Alien, Hero City, Heaven and Hell.</indent> <indent=3%>- Characters: Consort, Kitsune, Hypnotist, Hexmaster, Coven Leader, Mafioso, Shadow Wolf, Headsman, Stargal, Jack Frost, Plaguebearer.</indent> <indent=3%>- Houses: Mushroom Manor, Hall of Salem, Aquarium, One Man's Trash, Spaceship, Sphinx.</indent>
<b><u>Bug Fixes</u></b> • <indent=3%><b>Classic Ticket System:</b> Fixed an issue that could prevent the ticket from being consumed when playing a game using the ticket system.</indent>

<b>12/4/2020</b> Hey Townies, today we are releasing Town of Salem 3.3.3, a minor release focused on QOL tweaks and bug fixes. The most noticeable QOL improvement is that you can now ignore people in Party Chat and in Lobby Chat. The full list for this release is below.
<b><u>Improvements</u></b> • <indent=3%><b>Party Chat and Lobby Chat:</b> You may now mute/ignore people in the Party Chat and Lobby Chat. If somebody is posting bothersome things, feel the satisfaction of turning them off! If you mute somebody in the Party, that mute will carry over to the Lobby as well. So what happens if the offending person leaves the lobby after you have muted them, and then they return to the lobby to further offend you? Fear not, muting is persistent for the session so when that person returns, they’ll still be muted. Be aware that muting in the Party or Lobby does NOT carry over to the game itself. If the person continues to post offending things once the game starts, you’ll need to re-mute them in game.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>End Game:</b> Added Lobby Icons to End Game screen players list.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Lobby Description:</b> The description for the Serial Killer has been updated to mention their Cautious ability.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Chat:</b> Added additional URL types blocked in chat.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Burger Menu:</b> Removed link navigation confirmation for non-mobile platforms.</indent>
<b><u>Changes</u></b> • <indent=3%><b>Passwords:</b> The ampersand symbol (&) has been removed as an acceptable character for new passwords.</indent>
<b><u>Bug Fixes</u></b> • <indent=3%><b>Game Engine:</b> The game engine has been upgraded to Unity 2019.4.15f1, bringing with it additional underlying bug fixes.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Tooltips:</b> Fixed an issue that could cause a tooltip to not disappear when its parent was destroyed.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Chat:</b> Added horizontal and vertical tabs to the characters that are stripped from chat messages.</indent> • <indent=3%>Fixed a null reference exception disconnection that could occur due to a bug in the underlying text controls in Unity.</indent> • <indent=3%>Fixed a null reference exception disconnection that could occur during the water wheel role reveal.</indent> • <indent=3%>Fixed a null reference exception that could occur on mobile platforms when showing an ad.</indent>
<align=center><b><size=110%>• • •</size></b></align>
<b>11/23/2020</b> Hey Townies, today we are releasing Town of Salem 3.3.2. This release delivers on a frequently requested feature: a Role Library showing every role in the game and its associated information. This release also includes a few quality-of-life tweaks and a slew of bug fixes. We will also be starting Ranked Season 5 as soon as we are confident most of our players have upgraded to the latest version. The full list for this release is below.
<b><u>New Features</u></b> • <indent=3%><b>Role Library:</b> The new Role Library provides a card-like view of all the roles in the game and their associated information. Coven roles will only be seen if you own the Coven Expansion. The Role Library is accessible through the Burger Menu’s Settings Help tab.</indent>
<b><u>Improvements</u></b> • <indent=3%><b>Tooltips/Hot Links:</b> Tooltips and hot links have been updated for better placement, responsiveness, and formatting.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Chat:</b> Obvious URLs are now prevented from being sent or received in chat. Sending links is against the Rules, which are accessible on the Game Mode selection screen via the Rules button.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Game:</b> The active Game Mode is now shown in the Nameplate in-game.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>General:</b> Enabled incremental garbage collection on supported platforms (Non-WebGL) which should result in reduced lag due to garbage collection.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Game Engine:</b> The Unity game engine has been upgraded to 2019.4.14f1. This brings a slew of underlying bug fixes and enhancements.</indent>
<b><u>Bug Fixes</u></b> • <indent=3%><b>Startup:</b> Fixed an issue with our web version showing as a white screen when running on Big Sur OS.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Keyboard:</b> Fixed an issue with mobile screen keyboard sometimes not opening.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Registration:</b> Fixed the Email field validator improperly blocking some valid email addresses during registration.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Registration:</b> Reduced responsiveness of scroll wheel scrolling on Registration Notices large text fields.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Home:</b> Fixed an issue where logging on as restricted user, logging off, then logging in as non-restricted user caused incorrect display of Featured Items.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Customization:</b> Fixed some sizing oddness when first displaying character and pet on first open.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Game:</b> Fixed some positioning and scaling of the John Hathorne character skin.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Game:</b> Fixed some positioning of Blitzen pet during the last words and execution phases.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Game:</b> Fixed issue where pet animations were incorrectly displaying during Blast Off deaths.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Game:</b> Changed the Savant of Business achievement description to account for Coven Mafia roles now being available to play in Classic.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Game:</b> Reduced the amount of zoom while focusing in on executions.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Burger Menu:</b> Added a Confirm Email button under Help tab.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Burger Menu:</b> Added a Delete Account button under Help tab.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>User Disconnection:</b> Fixed an issue during the Name Selection/Role Reveal phase that could result in a disconnection.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>User Disconnection:</b> Fixed an issue when Forger was promoted to Mafioso that could result in a disconnection.</indent> • <indent=3%><b>Crash Fix:</b> Fixed a mobile issue that could result in a crash.</indent>
<align=center><b><size=110%>• • •</size></b></align>
<b>11/17/2020</b> Hey Townies, today we are releasing our last experimental Ranked role list test for both Ranked and Ranked Practice. After receiving some feedback on our previous changes, we have removed a Random Mafia from the list, replacing it with a Witch and removing the Neutralny Evil and replacing it with the Executioner. With these two Neutralny Evils, Mafia will have enough allies to be strong, but won't be able to easily coordinate and outnumber the Town early on in the game. We hope to be starting the next Ranked Season soon. Please let us know what you think!
<b><u>Changes</u></b> • <indent=3%><b>Ranked Role List:</b> New Ranked role list for both Ranked Practice and Ranked during the off season.</indent>

BlankMediaGames LLC ("us", "we", or "our") operates the https://www.blankmediagames.com website and the Town of Salem applications (the "Service").
This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our Service and the choices you have associated with that data.
We use your data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. Unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy, terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions.
<b><size=110%>Information Collection And Use</size></b>
We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you.
<b><i>Types of Data Collected</i></b>
<b>Personal Data</b>
While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you ("Personal Data"). Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:
• <indent=5%>Email address</indent> • <indent=5%>Cookies and Usage Data</indent>
<b>Usage Data</b>
We may also collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our Service or when you access the Service by or through a device ("Usage Data").
This Usage Data may include information such as your computer's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
When you access the Service by or through a device, this Usage Data may include information such as the type of device you use, your device unique ID, the IP address of your device, your operating system, the type of Internet browser you use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
<b>Tracking & Cookies Data</b>
We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and hold certain information.
Cookies are files with small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a website and stored on your device. Tracking technologies also used are beacons, tags, and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze our Service.
You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Service.
Examples of Cookies we use: • <indent=5%><b>Session Cookies.</b> We use Session Cookies to operate our Service.</indent> • <indent=5%><b>Preference Cookies.</b> We use Preference Cookies to remember your preferences and various settings.</indent> • <indent=5%><b>Security Cookies.</b> We use Security Cookies for security purposes.</indent>
<b><size=110%>Use of Data</size></b>
BlankMediaGames LLC uses the collected data for various purposes:
• <indent=5%>To provide and maintain the Service</indent> • <indent=5%>To notify you about changes to our Service</indent> • <indent=5%>To allow you to participate in interactive features of our Service when you choose to do so</indent> • <indent=5%>To provide customer care and support</indent> • <indent=5%>To provide analysis or valuable information so that we can improve the Service</indent> • <indent=5%>To monitor the usage of the Service</indent> • <indent=5%>To detect, prevent and address technical issues</indent>
